description:
*Users using devices that are WebOS 2 or greater should download the WebOS 2 version of this app available on the App Catalog.

Store cards can be a blessing, keeping track of them can be a hassle.  What’s On My Card will help you keep track of all your store cards and how much credit you have on them.  

Birthdays and Christmas are store cards season!! So many times you can get gift cards, and with many cards (some from the same store) along with your own store cards, credit, and debit cards it is not easy to keep track of the amount on each card.  

With What's On My Card, this is no longer an issue & you can know the total credit you have for a store even on multiple cards, making shopping at stores much easier and more convenient.

Pro version has no ads and removes all limitations.
